I'm a software developer living in Montevideo, Uruguay currently working at tarmac.

I did my degree at the University of the Republic, and I have 9+ years of experience as a developer, learning while I work with great people.

I'm a Music enthusiast, and I try to make a humble contribution by playing drums. From my personal point of view, I think there's a soundtrack for every moment in life.
